segmentosSRT.text:
Mother, when you finish,
send him to his room.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: This can't be happening!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Sit down.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text:
- Sit down!
- You planned all this, didn't you?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Come on! Get a move on!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text:
1949: Chiang Kai-shek's Nationalist Army
is losing the civil war.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text:
The Communists under Mao Zedong
are poised to take over China.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: So we're fighting the Communists.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: This case is in the way!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Whose is it? Get rid of it!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text:
Sir, it's mine.
I've got my things in it. Let me keep it.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text:
It's just a bunch of puppets.
Get rid of them! This is war!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: They're not mine. It's how I make my living.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: The wounded who froze to death.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Put it on. We must survive.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Lao Quan, the place is deserted.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: I'm still dizzy from drinking!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: What happened? No one's left?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: They've all run off.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: How could that be?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: The Reds must be on the attack.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Better to wait and become a POW.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: The Reds send POWs home.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Lao Quan! They're shooting!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Where did you find this coat?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: The coat's from my brother's unit.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text:
- What are you doing?
- They're shooting!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: What's your brother look like?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Just like me.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Lao Quan!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text:
We're racing towards Communism,
and you worry about food?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: We won't touch them.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: We're off to the next house.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Can't you control this child?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: What did you think you were doing?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: You won't go?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: I'll hit him again if I have to.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Sit then. Right in front of me!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Isn't he your own flesh and blood?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: You, looking after us! After all these years.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Ask him again.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Say I want him to.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Good boy, bring it over here.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Daddy.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: How do you like my singing?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: You little bastard! I'll break your legs!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text:
There'll be dumplings
at the canteen tonight...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: with a whole pig stuffed in each one!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Eat your fill, and then we'll continue.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Fifteen years, we'll surpass America.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: They'll all go to Taiwan!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: One to land on Chiang Kai-shek's bed...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: another on his dinner table...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: and the last in the toilet!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: And you killed him!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Go away!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: All right.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: I'm going.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text:
What are you doing, you little wretch?
I'll teach you a lesson!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: What are you doing?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: How dare you!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: What's going on?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: She smashed the windows of the jeep.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Who the heck is she?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Let her go!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Are you mad?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Don't forget your package!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Do stay! Come on inside.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: In good times, we think of Chairman Mao.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Let's sing a song!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Hold your little Red Books.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Clear a path! Ship sailing through!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: Time to wrap up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: First, pay respects to Chairman Mao.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text: What are these eggs for?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16

segmentosSRT.text:
Send her my very best. She's producing
a little revolutionary successor.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_16
